channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13908] 1.2 release umbrella
item.description: Umbrella for tasks related to the 1.2 release line starting.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I have changes for the RC in my local working copy, but I'd like some feedback on HBASE-13747 before taking a position on jdk8 for HBASE-13911. Planning on tomorrow night.

SUCCESS: Integrated in HBase-1.2-IT #375 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-1.2-IT/375/)
HBASE-13908 update site docs for 1.2 RC. (busbey: rev 6f07973dc2be5b521cd5e7fa220d5ab9cba6e76a)
